changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text

index.md.Ce plugin permet de connecter les contro: This plugin allows you to connect Swimo pool controllers with Jeedom
index.md.Le plugin permet de récupérer les valeur: The plugin makes it possible to recover the values of the various sensors as well as to control the actuators
index.md.changement de modes, On\/Off, changement: change of modes, On / Off, change of setpoints
index.md.Après téléchargement du plugin, il vous: After downloading the plugin, you just need to activate it, then configure some elements
index.md.La synchronisation des équipements perme: The synchronization of the equipment makes it possible to recover the probes and actuators configured on the Swimo
index.md.Une fois configuré dans un objet, vous o: Once configured in an object, you will get your elements in the dashboard
index.md.Les données sont actualisées toutes les: Data is updated every 5 minutes or during an action
index.md.Les valeurs de consigne ne sont pas affi: Setpoints are not displayed by default
index.md.Ils sont pleinement utilisables via les: They are fully usable via the scenarios
